buffs.description: The elf tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by elf unit seals.
buffs.name: Elf Token

hidden_abilites: Increases its movement speed by 8%, and its attack range by 10%.
Increases the attack range of all units by 7%, and the movement speed of all units by 8%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
[ Limit Break of Elf Token ] : The elf tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by elf unit seals.
description.skill1: Increases the Elf Tribe Friendliness gained from Elf Unit Seals (10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 100%)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of Elf units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Elf Sage ]
